title: Profile Stitch
description: Details about the ids that were joined by profile stitching.

profileStitchID.title: Profile Stitch ID
profileStitchID.description: The identity of the segment or snapshot definition in with the domain of the specific system that processes that type of segment.

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the profile stitch definition used. Useful for debugging.

endUserIDs.title: End User IDs
endUserIDs.description: Condensed, normalized encapsulation of all end user identifiers.
